SELECT * FROM ( SELECT UI.USER_ID, UI.USER_IMAGE_URL, UI.USER_NICKNAME, UI.USER_EMAIL, UI.USER_ACCESS_ID, UI.USER_STATUS, UI.USER_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.POST_ID) FROM POST p WHERE p.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID) AS POST_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT f.FEED_ID) FROM FEED f WHERE f.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID) AS FEED_COUNT, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT pc.POST_COMMENTS_ID) FROM POST_COMMENTS pc WHERE pc.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID ) + ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT fc.FEED_COMMENTS_ID) FROM FEED_COMMENTS fc WHERE fc.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID ) AS COMMENTS_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY UI.USER_ID) AS RNUM FROM USER_INFO UI
